properties.title: Generating a Jetspeed Portal
properties.subtitle: Using Maven to Generate a Custom Jetspeed Portal

section.name: Generating a Jetspeed Portal
section.p: To create a new custom portal named jetexpress, enter the following commands:
section.source:
# Linux cd /JetspeedTraining/workspace
# Windows cd \JetspeedTraining\workspace
mvn archetype:create -DarchetypeGroupId=org.apache.portals.jetspeed-2 -DarchetypeArtifactId=portal-archetype -DarchetypeVersion=2.1 -DgroupId=org.apache.portals.tutorials -DartifactId=jetexpress -Dversion=1.0
section.p: A directory named jetexpress under /JetspeedTraining/workspace should have been created. Notice that jetexpress will be the name of your portal, not jetspeed. The idea is that you can create a customized portal based upon Jetspeed, but with a different name, customized to meet your organization requirements.
